info.title: Univer API - Universitet Boshqaruv Tizimi
info.description:
# üéì Univer API Documentation

Universitet boshqaruv tizimi uchun RESTful API.

## üìã API Turlari

### 1. Student API (Talaba Kabineti)
Talabalar uchun shaxsiy kabinet API lari.
- Dashboard (Bosh sahifa)
- Profile (Profil)
- Documents (Hujjatlar: buyruq, kontrakt, ma'lumotnoma)
- Grades (Baholar)
- Schedule (Dars jadvali)
- Subjects (Fanlar)
- Tests (Testlar)
- Assignments (Topshiriqlar)

### 2. Teacher API (O'qituvchi Portali)
O'qituvchilar uchun dars yuritish va baholash API lari.
- Subjects (Fanlar)
- Schedule (Dars jadvali)
- Attendance (Davomat)
- Grading (Baholash)
- Resources (Dars materiallari)
- Assignments (Topshiriqlar)
- Tests (Testlar va savollar)
- Exams (Imtihonlar)

### 3. Staff API (Xodim Portali)
Xodimlar uchun shaxsiy kabinet.
- Profile (Profil)
- Authentication (Kirish)

### 4. Admin API (Boshqaruv Paneli)
Tizim administratorlari uchun CRUD API lari.
- Students (Talabalar)
- Employees (Xodimlar)
- Groups (Guruhlar)
- Specialties (Mutaxassisliklar)
- Departments (Kafedralar)
- HEMIS Integration (HEMIS bilan integratsiya)

## üîê Autentifikatsiya

Barcha himoyalangan API lar JWT Bearer token talab qiladi.

**Token olish:**
```bash
POST /api/v1/student/auth/login
POST /api/v1/employee/auth/login
```

**Token ishlatish:**
```bash
Authorization: Bearer YOUR_JWT_TOKEN
```

**Token yangilash:**
```bash
POST /api/v1/student/auth/refresh
POST /api/v1/employee/auth/refresh
```

## üìä Response Format

Barcha API lar standart format qaytaradi:

**Success:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    // Ma'lumotlar shu yerda
  },
  "message": "Operatsiya muvaffaqiyatli bajarildi"
}
```

**Error:**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Xatolik yuz berdi",
  "errors": {
    "field": ["Validatsiya xatosi"]
  }
}
```

## üåç Tillar

API barcha ma'lumotlarni o'zbek tilida qaytaradi.

## üìß Qo'llab-quvvatlash

Texnik yordam: support@univer.uz
Telegram: @univer_support

get.description: Returns a paginated list of departments (faculties and divisions) with optional filtering by type, parent, and status

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by department name or code

post.description: Creates a new department (faculty or division) with the provided data

_parent.description: Parent department ID (if this is a sub-department)

message.example: The code has already been taken

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific department

put.description: Updates department details. All fields are optional.

delete.description: Soft deletes a department. The department will be marked as inactive.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of employees with optional filtering by department, position, and status

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by employee name or code

post.description: Creates a new employee record with the provided data

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific employee

put.description: Updates employee details. All fields are optional.

delete.description: Soft deletes an employee. The employee will be marked as inactive.

get.summary: Get all academic groups with filters

parameters.description: Search by group name or code

parameters.name: _level
parameters.description: Filter by education level (1-4 for Bachelor, 5-6 for Master)

post.description: Creates a new academic group with the provided data

_level.description: Education level (1-4 for Bachelor, 5-6 for Master)

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific academic group including students list

put.description: Updates group details. All fields are optional.

delete.description: Soft deletes a group. The group will be marked as inactive.

post.description: Triggers data synchronization from HEMIS (Higher Education Management Information System). Can sync all entities or specific entity types.

entity.description: Entity type to sync (all, students, employees, departments, specialties, groups)

get.description: Returns the current status of HEMIS integration including last sync time, connection status, and sync history
Returns a paginated list of academic specialties with optional filtering by department and education type

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by specialty name or code

post.description: Creates a new academic specialty with the provided data

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific specialty including groups and curriculum

put.description: Updates specialty details. All fields are optional.

delete.description: Soft deletes a specialty. The specialty will be marked as inactive.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of students with optional filtering by group, specialty, level, and status

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by student name or student code

parameters.name: _level
parameters.description: Filter by education level (1-4 for Bachelor)

post.description: Creates a new student record with the provided data. Requires validated request data.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific student including group, grades, and attendance

put.description: Updates student details. All fields are optional. Requires validated request data.

delete.description: Soft deletes a student. The student will be marked as inactive (deactivated).

post.description: Uploads a profile image for the specified student. Max file size: 5MB. Allowed formats: JPEG, PNG, JPG.

422.description: Validation error (invalid file type or size)

get.description: Returns statistical data about students including total count, by level, by specialty, and active status

post.description: Authenticate employee (admin, teacher, staff) and return JWT token

login.description: Employee login or employee ID number

message.example: Employee is not active. Please contact an administrator.
CAPTCHA verification failed. Please try again.

post.description: Initiate two-factor authentication challenge (TOTP/SMS)
Verify two-factor authentication code (TOTP/SMS)

get.description: Returns the authenticated employee's profile information

post.description: Refresh the authentication token to extend session
Invalidate the current JWT token and logout the employee
Switch the active role for an employee with multiple roles
Send password reset token to employee's email

200.description: Password reset email sent (or generic success message)

message.example: Parolni tiklash uchun havola emailingizga yuborildi

get.description: Retrieve all permissions for the authenticated employee (cached for 10 minutes)

post.description: Verify if the authenticated employee has specific permissions

check_type.description: Check if user has ANY or ALL of the permissions (default: any)

post.description: Reset employee password using the token received via email

message.example: Parol muvaffaqiyatli o'zgartirildi. Endi tizimga kirishingiz mumkin.

get.description: Retrieve role-specific dashboard statistics and data for authenticated employee
Retrieve list of documents assigned to the authenticated employee for signing or already signed
Returns URL to view or print the document (legacy-compatible)

post.description: Prepare document signing request and return redirect URL to external signing provider

get.description: Retrieve the latest signing status for a specific document
Retrieve role-based menu structure for the authenticated employee

post.description: Verify if the authenticated employee has access to a specific menu path

path.description: Menu path to check access for

post.description: Invalidate the menu cache for the authenticated employee

get.description: Retrieve the complete menu structure (admin only)

menu.description: Complete menu structure with all items

get.description: Retrieve list of teacher workload records for the authenticated employee
Retrieve detailed information about a specific teacher workload including subjects, scientific and methodical work
Generate and download a PDF document of the teacher's workload (not yet implemented)

Initiates two-factor authentication challenge. Returns whether MFA is required and the authentication method.
Verifies the two-factor authentication code provided by the student

get.description: Returns the authenticated student's profile information including meta data, specialty, and group

post.description: Refreshes the authentication token and returns a new access token
Invalidates the current JWT token and logs out the student
Sends a password reset token to the student's email or phone. Requires either email or login (student ID).

message.example: Password reset token sent to your email

422.description: Validation error or email not found

post.description: Resets the student's password using the token received via email/SMS

message.example: Parol muvaffaqiyatli o'zgartirildi. Endi tizimga kirishingiz mumkin.
